pkgmetadata.longdescription: Similarity Regression // Similarity regression, evaluating the probability of association between sets of ontological terms and binary response vector. A no-association model is compared with one in which the log odds of a true response is linked to the semantic similarity between terms and a latent characteristic ontological profile - 'Phenotype Similarity Regression for Identifying the Genetic Determinants of Rare Diseases', Greene et al 2016 doi:10.1016/j.ajhg.2016.01.008.
